Outside hitter Kaitlyn Grangerjumps high to hit the ball toward Sam Houston State University Aug PERIOD  at the College Park Center PERIOD The Mavericks fell to the Mean Green  Tuesday at the University of North Texas PERIOD

The University of North Texas Mean Green handedtheUTA Volleyball team itsfirst road loss of the seasonTuesday dropping its record to  PERIOD

The Mavericks pushed the game to five sets after losing the first two butfell to the Mean Green  PERIOD

UTA scored  of the final  points to win the third set  PERIOD The Mavs started off with anotherrun in the fourth set to take a  lead PERIOD The Mavs held off the Mean Green again to force a fifth deciding set PERIOD

Both teams continuously traded the lead in the final set but UNT was able tothe win the set  PERIOD

Junioroutsidehitter QianaCaneteearned her third doubledouble of the season with  kills and  digs PERIOD Sophomore middle blocker JessicaNwabukoalso hada matchhigh of10 of the Mavs  blocks PERIOD

The Mavs will travel to Mississippi to play in the Ole Miss Invitational PERIOD Their first opponent will be the Ole Miss Rebels at6 p.m PERIOD Friday at The Pavilion PERIOD
